snippet: In his Republican counterpart’s home state, Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. focused on issues like tax cuts for the wealthy on a day dominated by events overseas.
abstract: Vice Pres Joseph R Biden Jr, campaigning in Wisconsin, focuses heavily on domestic politics in an attempt to refocus public attention after anti-American violence overseas dominates the news cycle; Biden's presence attests to the emerging importance of Wisconsin as a battleground state following native Rep Paul D Ryan's addition to the Republican ticket.
lead_paragraph: In his Republican counterpart’s home state, Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. focused on issues like tax cuts for the wealthy on a day dominated by events overseas.

headline.seo: Biden Hammers Romney and Ryan’s Domestic Policies
headline.main: Biden Hammers G.O.P. Ticket’s Domestic Policies
headline.print_headline: Biden Hammers G.O.P. Ticket’s Domestic Policies
